headline: SLB’s methane detection solution gains EPA approval
summary: The Methane LiDAR Camera was developed in compliance with the EPA OOOO standards.

raw.headline: SLB’s methane detection solution gains EPA approval
raw.summary: The Methane LiDAR Camera was developed in compliance with the EPA OOOO standards.

headline: Is Schlumberger Stock Underperforming the Nasdaq?
summary: Schlumberger has significantly underperformed the Nasdaq Composite over the past year, yet analysts remain optimistic about the stock’s longer-term prospects.

raw.headline: Is Schlumberger Stock Underperforming the Nasdaq?
